Pope Francis' health appears improved during visit to Rome parishPope Francis' health appeared to have improved on Friday as he presided at a ritual at a Rome parish without the signs of fatigue from a bout of bronchitis that forced him to limit activities over the past two weeks. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 18:20:12 GMT AA4TS6RGMRPQ7ASG47USLP53ZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/pope-francis-health-appears-improved-during-visit-rome-parish-2024-03-08/Reuters世界欧洲
'I forced her to go to school', Nigerian mother cries after mass school abductionSeven-year-old Safiya Kuriga complained she was feeling feverish but her mother still made her attend class on Thursday. Within two hours, gunmen entered her school and kidnapped Safiya and some 300 other students in Nigeria's northern Kaduna state. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 18:10:30 GMT QC67T2Y5PNNFVIBAKK5J2MCUOE https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/i-forced-here-to-go-school-nigerian-mother-cries-after-mass-school-abduction-2024-03-08/Garba Muhammad, Bosan Yakusak世界非洲
Activist slashes painting of British author of Jewish homeland declarationA pro-Palestinian activist slashed a painting of the early 20th-century British foreign minister Arthur Balfour at Cambridge University on Friday, saying his 1917 declaration was the reason the Palestinians had lost their homeland to Israel. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 18:05:24 GMT DD6IFEK5VROLFIDZ7SWF44年https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/activist-slashes-painting-british-author-jewish-homeland-declaration-2024-03-08/Reuters世界英国
Blinken urged Haitian PM to support government transition proposal, State Dept saysU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken spoke to Haitian Prime Minister Ariel Henry on Thursday and urged him to support a political transition proposal for the country, the State Department said on Friday. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 17:36:15 GMT 3DQXLDZZ3NKTFCBNG7DLPUN3KA https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/blinking-urged-haitian-pm-support-government-transition-proposal-state-dept-says-2024-03-08/Reuters世界美洲
Italy's Meloni unexpectedly replaces G7 sherpa with spy chiefItalian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni on Friday replaced the country's sherpa for the Group of Seven (G7) with the head of the secret service, according to a statement, in an unexpected move just three months ahead of the leaders' summit in Italy. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 17:32:52 GMT VDECDS6A5FJURKPB4C35MLYFKU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/italys-meloni-unexpectedly-replaces-g7-sherpa-with-spy-chief-2024-03-08/Reuters世界欧洲
Safety at Zaporizhzhia nuclear plant worsening, Ukraine saysSafety at the Russian-held Zaporizhzhia nuclear power plant (ZNPP) in Ukraine is worsening daily, Ukraine's energy minister said on Friday, pledging to keep pressuring Russia at the U.N. nuclear watchdog to withdraw from the site. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 17:30:50 GMT MVZ2L4YOXVK4DFMH3TFIBR3QBA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/safety-zaporizhzhia-nuclear-plant-worsening-ukraine-says-2024-03-08/Francois Murphy世界欧洲
Thousands of pregnant women at risk in Haiti's paralyzed capital, UN saysNearly 3,000 pregnant women in Haiti's capital, Port-au-Prince, risk being cut off from essential healthcare if the current gang war-driven paralysis of the city continues, the United Nations said on Friday. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 17:25:13 GMT 5ZXI6JQ46FLKZB5M46OLQFSEPQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/thousands-of-pregnant-women-at-risk-haitis-paralyzed-capital-un-says-2024-03-08/Sarah Morland世界美洲
Blinken says the ball is in Hamas' court on Gaza ceasefireU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Friday it was up to Hamas to agree to a ceasefire that would allow more humanitarian aid into Gaza and pave the way for talks on an "enduring resolution" to the conflict. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 17:20:25 GMT I2TKRQQN3RLWBIMHYEZ74YFAT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/blinken-says-ball-is-hamas-court-gaza-ceasefire-2024-03-08/Reuters世界中东地区
US aid policy on Gaza 'absurd' given military support for Israel, UN expert saysA U.N. expert on Friday criticised U.S. efforts to boost humanitarian aid to Gaza, such as plans for a temporary port and recent air drops, which he said were "absurd" and "cynical" methods so long as military aid to Israel continues. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 17:05:31 GMT UXJVPDOHEBNZTPQZNPCZEP3PIY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-aid-policy-gaza-absurd-given-military-support-israel-an-expert-says-2024-03-08/Emma Farge世界中东地区
Unwell King Charles absent, but still very much in the pictureBritain's King Charles will on Monday miss the first major royal event since his cancer diagnosis, but there is no sign of the monarch vanishing from public view let alone contemplating stepping down from his role, experts say. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 17:04:42 GMT R6H52TVVABMZ7G2Q4HFQIJFQ54 https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/unwell-king-charles-absent-still-very-much-picture-2024-03-08/Sarah Mills世界英国
Israeli officials mull arming some Gaza civilians as aid security crumbles-reportIsraeli officials have discussed arming some civilians in Gaza to provide security protection for aid convoys into the besieged enclave, as part of wider planning for humanitarian supplies after fighting ends, the Israel Hayom daily said on Friday. Fri, 08 Mar 2024 15:14:00 GMT XQ3XVMXBIFNAZHSZRN5DTSX7OU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-officials-mull-arming-some-gaza-civilian-aid-security-crumbles-report-2024-03-08/Reuters世界中东地区
